text: Aechmea wuelfinghoffii is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== wuelfinghoffii Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1998 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aechmea wuelfinghoffii
